description:
Mom goes with Bunji to the park where Bunji often sees his friends.  However, they mysteriously and repeatedly greet each other with "Yo", only to walk around the park and greet each other again...; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house.  Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can`t last around Grandma; Dad and Grandma are alone in the house.  Dad somehow feels uncomfortable while trying very hard to be mindful, but he can`t last around Grandma; The good looking Masa and the tough guy Takashi are Fumi`s classmates.  Which one of them is a suitable match...? Both of them have their good points... White Fumi and Black Fumi have a heated debate inside of a conflicted Fumi`s head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Round and Round / Child and Parent / Understand Your Feelings / Melon
ぐるぐる / おやこ / 気持ちはわかる / メロン
